DOC.brief_summary: To determine quality life follow radical excision recto-vaginal endometriosis .
DOC.detailed_description: Patients undergo surgery severe endometriosis bowel involvement ask complete pre-operative post operative questionnaire 2 , 6 12 month , 5 , 10 , 15 , 20 25 year post operatively . Quality life measure use EHP-30 EQ-5D questionnaire . Bowel symptom measure use GIQLI . Dysmenorrhoea , dyspareunia , dyschezia chronic pain measure use visual analogue scale .
DOC.criteria: All woman undergo plan surgery severe endometriosis bowel involvement . Patients decline complete questionnaire whatever reason and/or anonymous data analyse .
